entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, Harry is described as bending low to retrieve a book.

entities.name: book

entities.name: felix felicis
entities.description: A liquid that Harry won in a competition, it's now safely hidden inside a pair of socks.

entities.name: half-blood prince
entities.description: The book that Harry is currently holding, its back cover has some scribbled writing.

entities.name: instructions
entities.description: Instructions that won Harry a bottle of Felix Felicis.

entities.name: pair of socks
entities.description: A pair of socks where Felix Felicis is safely hidden.

relationships.description: Harry is holding the book as he tries to retrieve it.
The instructions won Harry a bottle of Felix Felicis.
This book is the property of the Half-Blood Prince, as written on its back cover.
Felix Felicis is safely hidden inside a pair of socks.
